Class LoginActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper

            • com.activities.am1.LoginActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class LoginActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    LoginActivity First activity of the application Log in in the Auditorium system, pretending to seems as much as is possible to the web site. An user name and password are needed. Created on January 8th, 2013
    Author:
    Bernardo Plaza
